2014 · Project

Creative Portfolios.

Helping creatives build custom content for their portfolio websites.

Play Screencast

TL;DR

Project

At Format the team I was a part of was tasked with rebuilding the Format system's custom pages. At the time pages were simply prebuilt templates. We created a modular templating engine that allowed for users to create near-infinite configurations of pages with very low complexity. Using pre-build modules users wouldn't have to worry about which modules would work well together. The modules were designed using a strict grid, ensuring that most configurations look great "out of the box." I worked both design and development on this project.

Goals

  • Build a system that users can create pages with custom content
  • Use modules to allow users to construct their own page layouts and templates
  • Design modules that will look great together (user doesn't need to have design knowledge)
  • Keep complexity low (modules only stack horizontally)
Format.com
